oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Computation of OFT bounds for robust tracking specifications
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NATARAJ, PSV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: quantitative feedback theory
aircraft control
constraint theory
robust control
motion control
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An algorithm is proposed for generation of QFT controller bounds to achieve robust tracking specifications. The proposed algorithm uses quadratic constraints and interval plant templates to compute the bounds, and presents several improvements over existing QFT tracking bound generation algorithms. The proposed algorithm (1) guarantees robustness against template inaccuracies, (2) guarantees robustness against phase discretization, (3) provides a posteriori error estimates, (4) is computationally efficient, achieving a reduction in flops and execution time, typically by 1-2 orders of magnitude. The algorithm is demonstrated on an aircraft example having five uncertain parameters.
